content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 2 ** join my fb group to share your makes get exclusive discounts cal s and free patterns join here 1 the basket is made out of a square where 3 of its corners are folded towards the middle and then sewn along the sides the square is made using the suzette stitch to obtain a nice textured fabric the suzette crochet stitch is made by using only single_crochet and double_crochet stitches this crochet hanging basket pattern is a beginner friendly pattern it is also a great crochet project if you want to learn how to crochet the suzette stitch and end up with a super practical item stitches used in this pattern single_crochet double_crochet - skill level - easy - the pattern is written using english u s terminology - hook size needed 6 0 mm / j - the basket is crocheted worsted #4 weight yarn - i used knit picks - comfy worsted 3 **the pattern is worked with 2 strands held together** - total amount of yarn needed - 170gr/340m/370yds if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me copyright © 2022 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the pattern and photos in this design are property of gootie you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern please note that there is only a certain amount of variations possible when one crochets and any similarities to other patterns are purely coincidental to the best of my knowledge this pattern is my original unique design return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final 1 https //www facebook com/groups/220830062977059 2 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up 3 http //shrsl com/347g2
